attributes.action: NOT SIGN OUR COUNTRYS FREEDOM AWAY TO BRUSSELS EU CONSTITUTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I DO NOT WANT OUR COUNTRY TO BECOME A FEDERAL EUROPE. WE NEED ALL PEOPLE TO SIGN THIS PETITION WHO ARE AGAINST TONY BLAIR SELLING US DOWN THE RIVER. ALL BRITISH CITIZENS HAVE A RIGHT TO A VOTE SO COME ON BRITS WE'VE GOT 1 MONTH TO PROTEST TO BLAIR AND HIS GOVERNMENT

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read. There are also other petitions already on this issue.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
